summary: This mod overhauls the One-Handed Skill; It adds a disarming-perk, fixes critical damage, adds a new dagger-perk that gives daggers a high chance of dealing critical damage, increases the critical damage of Critical Charge and increases the dual-wielding speed of Dual Flurry.
descriptionHtml:
DEUTSCHE VERSION: (bald)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/51361] Archery Overhaul ENGLISH [/url]
Schießkunst Overhaul DEUTSCH: (bald)

Two-Handed Overhaul ENGLISH: (soon)
Zweihändig Overhaul DEUTSCH: (bald)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:

After I realized that the critical strikes in Skyrim are rather unimpressive and there are no perks for daggers, I decided to make this mod to add a dagger-perk, a disarming-perk for dual wielding, revise Dual-Flurry and critical strikes to make them more effective and worth spending skill points.


New perks:

Dual Dexterity (1/3):

Requirements:
- 50 points in One-Handed
- Dual Flurry rank 1

Effect:
- 15% chance to disarm the target with a dual wielding power attack

Dual Dexterity (2/3):

Requirements:
- 70 points in One-Handed
- Dual Dexterity rank 1

Effect:
- 30% chance to disarm the target with a dual wielding power attack

Dual Dexterity (3/3):

Requirements:
- 90 points in One-Handed
- Dual Dexterity rank 2

Effect:
- 50% chance to disarm the target with a dual wielding power attack


Assassin (1/3):

Requirements:
- 30 points in One-Handed
- Armsman rank 1

Effects:
- 15% chance of dealing critical damage with daggers
- 2.0x critical damage

Assassin (2/3):

Requirements:
- 60 points in One-Handed
- Assassin rank 1

Effects:
- 25% chance of dealing critical damage with daggers
- 2.5x critical damage

Assassin (3/3):

Requirements:
- 90 points in One-Handed
- Assassin rank 2

Effects:
- 35% chance of dealing critical damage with daggers
- 3.0x critical damage


Changes of existing perks:

Bladesman (1/3):

Requirements:
- 30 points in One-Handed
- Armsman rank 1

Effects:
- 10% chance of dealing critical damage with swords
- 1.5x critical damage

Bladesman (2/3):

Requirements:
- 60 points in One-Handed
- Bladesman rank 1

Effects:
- 15% chance of dealing critical damage with swords
- 1.75x critical damage

Bladesman (3/3):

Requirements:
- 90 points in One-Handed
- Bladesman rank 2

Effects:
- 25% chance of dealing critical damage with swords
- 2.0x critical damage


Dual Flurry (1/2):

Requirements:
- 30 points in One-Handed
- Armsman rank 1

Effect:
- Dual wielding attacks are 25% faster

Dual Flurry (2/2):

Requirements:
- 50 points in One-Handed
- Dual Flurry rank 1

Effect:
- Dual wielding attacks are 50% faster


Critical Charge:

Requirements:
- 50 points in One Handed
- Fighting Stance

Effect:
- Power attack while sprinting that does 3x critical damage

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Requirements:

- Skyrim
- WinRAR or 7-Zip


Installation:

- Unpack the file into your Skyrim/Data directory and activate it in your Skyrim-launcher


Used Software:

- Skyrim Creation Kit
